article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: The American Medical Association endorsed an end to non-medical exemptions for immunization, saying the nation's largest doctor group would throw its considerable lobbying clout behind state and national efforts to halt personal and religious exemptions from vaccinations for children entering schools. The vote today by the AMA’s policy-making House of Delegates [...]
